primarySegments.name: Busy Professionals
primarySegments.description: Dog owners with demanding jobs who need reliable dog walking services during work hours.

problemsNeeds: Lack of time to walk dogs due to work commitments
Need for trustworthy and reliable dog walkers
Desire for real-time updates and tracking of dog walks
behaviors: Use the app during work hours to schedule walks
Engage with customer reviews and ratings for choosing walkers

primarySegments.name: Elderly Dog Owners
primarySegments.description: Older adults who own dogs and require assistance with dog walking due to physical limitations.

psychographics: Cautious with technology but willing to learn
problemsNeeds: Physical limitations preventing regular dog walks
Need for affordable and trustworthy services
Desire for simple and easy-to-use technology
behaviors: Seek recommendations from family or friends
Use app features that are straightforward and user-friendly

primarySegments.name: Young Urban Dwellers
primarySegments.description: Young adults living in urban areas who own dogs and have active social lives.

psychographics: Frequent users of mobile apps and social media
problemsNeeds: Busy social and work schedules limiting time for walks
Need for flexible and on-demand services
Desire for integration with social media for sharing experiences
behaviors: Use the app for last-minute bookings
Share experiences and reviews on social media
